text: Answer: (c) Solution: Follow (E) = fa, b, $} E > «E E — eaEbE E — ebEaE E—e For ‘@ there is a shift-reduce conflict because in Io state there is a reduce and entry {E —s} and also a shift-entry for E — saEbE. Similarly, for ‘b, & there is a shift-reduce conflict because in Iostate there is a reduce and entry E -} and also a shift-entry for E — sbEaE. So. option (c) is correct.
